original_title: Au coeur de la forÃªt du Sasquatch
overview: In the heart of the Canadian forest there hides an unknown animal: Bigfoot. Also known as Sasquatch or Yeti. But one man is actively looking for him, Robert Kennedy is devoting his life to finding the mythical creature. He is joined in his quest by French cartoonist Philippe Coudray and Belgian physicist Leon Brenig. Come with the three of them on their passionate and comical adventure in search of the mysterious Bigfoot.
title: In Search of Bigfoot
